sentences.sContent: I was an atheist at the time.
sentences.sContent_eng: I was an atheist at the time.
sentences.sCn: 那个时候我是一个无神论者。

sentences.sContent: So the assumption at that time of course, was that if you were an atheist there was nothing for you to make you moral.
sentences.sContent_eng: So the assumption at that time of course, was that if you were an atheist there was nothing for you to make you moral.
sentences.sCn: 当然了这在当时只是假设而已，如果你是一个无神论者,那么对你来说将没有任何道德上的教义。

words.tran: 无神论的，不信神的；无神论者的

trans.tranOther: An atheist is a person who believes that there is no God. Compare .
